item.tib: gsang sngags rgyud sde bzhi'i gzungs sngags dang snying po byin brlabs can rnams phyogs gcig tu rin po che bu ston pas bkod pa stod na bla ma rgyud pa'i mtshan 'bum mang po dang bcas pa
'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa
item.skttrans: amny+dzu shrI dz+nyA na sat+wa s+ya pa ra ma ar+thA nA ma saM gI ti
item.coloph: bcom ldan 'das di bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas gzungs pa rdzogs so

item.chap: 1. 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi tshul rab tu byung ba [phal chen Yi (56), 1b1]

item.coloph: rme bdun zhes pa'i skar ma'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// //ston pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gyis gsungs pa/ rme bdun zhes pa'i skar ma'i mdo sde 'di/ /brten pa'i sems kyis dra cha nid gad mchod pa/ /del phan pa 'byung zhes rab shes nas/ /u rug po ga'i ming can bu gur che/ /chung ngu'i dus nas rtag par chos 'di la/ /yid ches ldan pas rgyun du klob/ cing mchod/ rang gi go 'phang tshol zhing gsol 'debs pas/ 'thun par sbyong ba'i de dag bo bsod nams can/ /grol mdzad ston pa sangs rgyas sbrul pa gang / /thog the mur rgya ba du yun tu tshe ring zhing / /thug can rgyal po chen por 'gyur bar 'dod/ /blo ldan byang chub sems dpa' bdag po de/ slob nas se chen rgyal po'i gdan sar nga dugs/ /bdag gi yid la 'dod ba chis gyur bas/ /the tshom med par chos 'dir nges shes skyes/ /bu gu ra yi ger chos kyi mdo sde 'di/ /sngon chad gzhan gyis bsgyur ba med pas na/ /mang po'i hor rnams dad pas mchod gyur ces/ /bdag gis hor gyi skad du bsgyur pa yin/ /nga yis ji ltar bsams pa 'grub 'gyur na/ /sems can khri phrag stong phrag 'dod pa kun/ /bdag nyid ji bzhin tshem par gyur cig ces stong phrag sbar du btab nas kun la bkye/ /'di yi bsod nams drin gyi 'bras bu'i mthus/ /bdag po rgyal po dpon mo brgyud par bcas/ /yun du sku tshe ring zhing bsod nams 'phel/ /mthar thugs sangs rgyas go 'phang rnyer gyur cig rgyal khams dgra dang 'khrug bzhi ba dang / gdon dang bar chad rims med bde gyur cig/ char rlung dus 'bab mu ge med 'gyur zhing / /bdag gis smras dang bsam don 'grub bgyur cig/ bdag dang pha ma bu sogs gnyen rnams dang / /'tsho ba'i dbun dad sems can mang por bcas/ /'jig rten 'dir yang chos kyi 'dod pa chis/ /bde ba can zhing rtag par phyin gyur cig/ then li dang po'i lo 'brug gi lo zla ba bcu pa'i tshes gcig la sbar du btab pa yin/ /mdo 'di rgya gar gi yul nas rgya gar gyi ban Di ta gcig dang / thad za mtshang gis khyer te rgya'i yul du bsgyur ro/ /rgya chen po'i yul du rgyas par gyur cing gnas pa las/ rgyal po chen po'i blon po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su byung ba dad pa dang shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i gim rtse gong lun'i hu'i g-yu'i shtith'i hu u drug bo gas bskul te/ yu gur gyi bstan pa'i bdag po b+radz+nyA shrIs hor gyi skad dang yi ger bsgyur nas stong phrag gnyis sbar du btag a lin ti mur ta'i si dus yu gur gyi skad du bsgyur te/ stong phrag gcig sbar du btab nas chos kyi sgyin pa byas te/ hor dang yu gur la rgyas par byas shing / ta'i hu nyid kyang sngon chad sog po'i chos lugs 'dzin pa la/ chos 'di'i byin brlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs shing rab tu byung te/ 'di'i yon tan rnams nyams su myong bar gyur pa'o/ /slad kyis me mo glang gi lo la lo ts+tsha ba ma ti phal dang / shrI a' nanda badz+ras gud thad gi gtsug la gang du/ bod kyi skad dang yi ger bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab ba'o// //

item.tib: mig bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo
item.coloph: mig bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo/ rdzogs s+ho/ /auM ye d+harmA he du b+rab+ha he du na te ShA na ta thA go to h+ya bA dad/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+haH e bamA b+ha dI ma hA shra ma na ye swA hA/ /
